t: How to Get Amazon Brand Approval Without a Trademark in 2024: A Step-by-Step Guide
s: To start, Log in to your Amazon Seller account and navigate to the “Add Products” section from the catalog. Enter the item name and select the suggested category or manually choose one that fits your product. Specify your product’s brand name. Even without a brand registry, you can still apply for brand approval. Choose a product ID, such as UPC, and proceed to the next step...
